references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis and improvement of the training and sampling strategies for diffusion models, directly informing the DeBaRA architecture and training procedure.

references.paper_title: Atiss: Autoregressive transformers for indoor scene synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a strong baseline for indoor scene synthesis using autoregressive transformers, serving as a key comparison point for evaluating DeBaRA's performance.

references.paper_title: Lion: Latent point diffusion models for 3d shape generation
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of diffusion models for 3D shape generation, supporting the use of diffusion-based approaches for the more complex task of scene arrangement generation.

references.paper_title: Diffuscene: Denoising diffusion models for generative indoor scene synthesis
references.reason: This is a very recent and relevant work applying score-based generative models to the specific task of 3D scene synthesis, providing a direct comparison against the proposed DeBaRA method.
